sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 1 at 4:00 p.m.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge:
location: Left and center lanes closed tonight 8/1 from 7 p.m. to midnight.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge:
location: Crews will be performing bridge deck patching work.  Expect significant delays in the area.
